name: Grunenberg
description:
Famous myth hunter Michael Soloman, while continuing his research and explorations, finds himself in a abandoned area named Grunenberg based on the information he has heard. This region, which has had one relatively unknown witch case, seems to hold significant potential for him. One day, Michael Soloman's grandson, Jimmy Soloman, receives a letter from his grandfather. In this letter, his grandfather urges Jimmy to come to Grunenberg immediately, bringing a camera with him and never turning it off. Although Jimmy isn't very close with his grandfather, he sets out for Grunenberg to find him and understand what is happening in that area.



- Visuals and audio design reminiscent of VHS cassette tapes,
- An unsettling and claustrophobic atmosphere instead of cheap horror,
- Blending immersive progression with puzzles,
-Interludes and a plethora of discoverable story content,
-Dynamic enemy AI that tracks your movements,
-Light and flashlight mechanics affected by the enemy,
